name: pomodoro-timer
description: GTK Pomodoro Timer built with GJS and TypeScript

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run bundle:tests && jasmine
scripts.ui:validate: sh -c 'for file in src/view/*.ui; do gtk4-builder-tool validate "$file" || exit 1; done'
scripts.ui:simplify: sh -c 'for file in src/view/*.ui; do gtk4-builder-tool simplify --replace "$file" || exit 1; done'
